title: FS N284 John Ward from Advertising Sheet Price Reduced
author: t213

posts.post_title: FS N284 John Ward from Advertising Sheet Price Reduced
posts.post_content: Uncut sheets of N284s were used as advertising pieces when they were issued with additional printing on them (see scan). I think Tik & Tik once had most of an uncut sheet of them at a show that I saw. WAS $395 NOW $345 delivered. Thanks, Andy
